name: Nail Salon Virtual Nail Art Salon Game for Girls
name_original: Nail Salon Virtual Nail Art Salon Game for Girls
description:
Free for a Limited time! Completely Unlocked! Download Now!
Clip, buff, polish, decorate your nails and much more! Manicure virtual nails like a real nail artist! Choose a skin tone, trim your nails with nail clippers, and buff to a squeaky shine. Then choose from loads of polish color collections to custom paint gorgeous nails. Let your inner nail artist out! Choose from absolutely tons of sparkling rhinestones, crystals, diamonds, gemstones, stickers, decals, hearts, flowers, fruit and much much more to decorate your nails. Once you are happy with your creations, save your nails to your album, or share!
Clean up with nail polish remover and start all over!

FEATURES:

Seven different skintones
Realistic nail clippings
Realistic sounds
Nail growth formula
Nail buffer for shine
Apply custom polish by painting
Four nail polish color collections
Nail art pens
Fourteen gems/decals collections!
Save to nail album
Share on Facebook
Email

Current Polish Collections Include:

Classic Reds, Pinks, Purples and Blues
Pastel Polishes
Grunge/Dark Colors
Brights/Neon Glow

Download Nails™ now to enjoy a glistening new manicure any time!
